segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she seems oblivious to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so sneaky, taking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything looks outside the window, such a contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to do something before this turns into a complete disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
